components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,POWER TRAIN,SEAT BELTS,STRUCTURE,LATCHES/LOCKS/LINKAGES,EQUIPMENT,UNKNOWN OR OTHER
summary: OVER THE SPAN OF THE LAST 1 1/2 YEARS I HAVE HAD THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS  *REAR SEAT BELTS LOCKED UP WOULDN'T LOOSEN FAR ENOUGH TO GET MY CHILD OUT OF THE CAR.  *FRONT SEAT BELTS (BOTH) WOULD COME OPEN WHILE THE VEHICLE WAS IN MOTION.  *DRIVERS SIDE DOOR WOULDN'T LATCH WHEN TRYING TO CLOSE IT, HAD TO JIGGLE THE INSIDE HANDLE  *SPARE TIRE ARM WOULDN'T STAY IN THE LOCKED POSITION WHEN OPEN. STILL WON'T  *FOUR WHEEL DRIVE WOULDN'T ENGAGE  *LIFTER NOISE--COLLAPSED LIFTER  *HEAD WARPED  *CHECK ENGINE LIGHT HAD COME ON A FEW TIMES   *CUP HOLDERS (FRONT AND REAR) FELL APART  *OUTSIDE TRIM WAS FALLLING OFF.  *JB
